Hello, my name is Dave Collins. I'm a Full Stack Web Developer from Canton, Ohio.

About me

I'm a US Navy veteran and earned my B.S. in Computer Science from the University of Akron in 2008. I've built and launched many websites and applications for both large and small clients. Some of my clients include Estée Lauder, Mac Cosmetics, Darphin Skincare, Goodyear Latin America, Gojo Industries, Aultman Foundation, Baja Pizza Fish, and many more.
